requirement.en: When your DARK Attribute Galaxy Type monster with 1500 or more ATK is destroyed by an opponent's attack.

effect.en: Special Summon 1 DARK Attribute Galaxy Type monster from your Graveyard to your field in face-up Attack Position. The monster Special Summoned by this effect loses 500 ATK until the end of this turn.

ja.set_name: Deck Mod Pack: Double Star of the Assault!!
